price: Twebwe Allah, Twarahamagaye Musa ari amaja mu kabande k’umusozi Twuuri wari iburyo bwiwe[380], maze Tumutera iteka ryo kuvugana na Twe Allah ukuri kwamye[381].
arabic: وَنَٰدَيۡنَٰهُ مِن جَانِبِ ٱلطُّورِ ٱلۡأَيۡمَنِ وَقَرَّبۡنَٰهُ نَجِيّٗا
footnotes:
[380] Ico gihe yari mu nzira asubira muri Misiri (Egiputa).
[381] Iyi Aayah iremeza ko Imana Allah Ivuga mu buryo buberanye n’icubahiro n’ubumana bwayo.

meta.transliteration: wanādaynāhu min jānibi al-ṭūri al-aymani waqarrabnāhu najiyyan
